original_title: Pain of Salvation: On the Two Deaths of Pain of Salvation
overview: Filmed during their successful Scarsick tour in Paradiso, Amsterdam (Netherlands), this release contains the full concert on one DVD and a documentary and pic gallery on a separate DVD. A dynamic show of one of the leading bands in the genre of metal and progressive rock. The documentary will mark the end and the beginning of a period in the life of Pain of Salvation.
title: Pain of Salvation: On the Two Deaths of Pain of Salvation
